colorPalette.pageDescription: Generate personalized color palettes with artificial intelligence
colorPalette.title: AI Color Palette
colorPalette.subtitle: Express how you feel and let AI generate a unique color palette that will transform the entire site

step1.title: Write a prompt
step1.description: Describe your mood, emotion, or any concept

step2.title: AI generates the palette
step2.description: Our AI analyzes your input and creates a harmonious palette

step3.title: Colors applied
step3.description: Colors are applied instantly to the entire site

colorPalette.generateDescription: Write any word or phrase that represents a feeling, emotion, or concept
colorPalette.recentPalettesDescription: Quickly access your last 5 generated palettes. Click any to apply it.
colorPalette.promptRequired: Please write something to generate the palette
colorPalette.paletteError: Could not generate the palette. Try again.
colorPalette.noPalettesYet: You haven't generated any palettes yet. Create your first palette above!

colorHistory.pageDescription: Explore all color palettes generated by the community
colorHistory.title: Palette History
colorHistory.subtitle: Explore all color palettes generated by the community and find inspiration
colorHistory.howItWorksDescription: Every time someone generates a palette with AI, it's saved here. You can explore other users' creations, search by keywords, and apply any palette to your site experience with just one click.
colorHistory.noResults: No palettes found with that criteria
colorHistory.noPalettesCreated: You haven't created any palettes yet
colorHistory.noLocalHistory: No palettes in your local history
colorHistory.historyCleared: Local palette history has been cleared
